author: Staff Reporter
text:
Panic struck villagers in Puliyankurichi in Thalaivasal block in the district when they heard a loud blast on Wednesday evening.

However, no damage to property was reported.

More than 4,000 people reside in the village.

They heard the blast, rushed out of their houses and gathered on the road. Initially, villagers feared that it could be a cylinder blast or some sound from quarry.

They also suspected that the sound could occur while digging well using explosives.

No damages

However, there were no damages to houses or other properties.

Officials said that the noise could be due to blasts in the quarries nearby.
title: Villagers complain of loud blast
